summary: I RECEIVED THE SAFETY RECALL NOTICES FROM FCA  IN NOVEMBER 2015 AND  MAY 2016.  TO REPLACE THE AIRBAGS.  ABSOLUTELY NOTHING HAS BEEN DONE BY FCA  (FIAT CHRYSLER AUTOMOBILES)OR METRO ATLANTA CHRYSLER DEALERS TO REMEDY THE PROBLEM.  THEY SAY PARTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE AND CAN OFFER NO TIMELIME FOR REPLACEMENT..  I HAVE CALLED FCA TWICE ABOUT THIS.  AT THIS POINT, WHAT ARE MY LEGAL OPTIONS FOR REPLACEMENT OF THE DEFECTIVE AIRBAGS IN MY VEHICLE?
